
```{r}
# this is my additions

   geom_point()
```

```{r}
#unfinalized summary
my_summary<-data.frame(pie_crab$size,pie_crab$site)

size_summary<-my_summary%>%group_by(site=pie_crab$site)%>%summarize(mean=round(mean(pie_crab$size),2),sd=sd(pie_crab$size),count=n())
#Summary table
size_summary
```
